overview: The events of the play revolve around (Hia) Sabreen, who works as a seamstress in Mansoura, and for the mistreatment of the owner of the store, she decides to go to Cairo to work at the branch of sewing and she asks for her address in one of the shoe stores. There, she identifies with (Tayfour) Mamdouh Wafi, who works in the shop. It is recognized by the owner of the store (Hakkai) Mahmoud Al-Qalawi, and there are paradoxes that go out from him to be hit by a motorcycle in the field in front of the shop. Who trades in the currency. She discovers that she has stolen her money - so she can sympathize with her, and she will live with her in her apartment, and at the same time work in the shoe store. And Tayfour loves her.
title: Hamry Gamry
